title: MPEG_primitive_V3C
description: glTF extension to specify support for V3C compressed primitives.

_MPEG_V3C_AD.gltf_detailedDescription: a reference to the accessor that points to the atlas data.

_MPEG_V3C_GVD_MAPS.description: an array of references to video texture maps.
_MPEG_V3C_GVD_MAPS.gltf_detailedDescription: an array of references to video textures that provide the geometry maps.

_MPEG_V3C_OVD_MAP.description: a reference to a video texture that provides the occupancy map
_MPEG_V3C_OVD_MAP.gltf_detailedDescription: a reference to a video texture that provides the occupancy map

_MPEG_V3C_AVD.gltf_detailedDescription: An array of references to the video textures that provide the attribute data

_MPEG_V3C_CAD.description: This object lists different properties described for the Common Atlas Data in ISO/IEC 23090-5.
_MPEG_V3C_CAD.gltf_detailedDescription: This object lists different properties described for the Common Atlas Data in ISO/IEC 23090-5.
